title: Pinnacle Event Rentals
xml:
<map name="1939829" theme="dark-prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Pinnacle Event Rentals" id="1"><topic position="386,-135" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[147 12 St Brandon MB R7A 4L8 Canada
(204) 515-5515
https://pinnacleeventrentals.ca/
events@pinnacleeventrentals.ca

Pinnacle Event Rentals is a premier event rental company based in Brandon, 
Manitoba, offering a comprehensive range of services to clients throughout the 
region. Specializing in tent rentals—including pole tents, structure tents, and 
marquee tents—as well as tables, chairs, linens, tableware, and décor, Pinnacle 
provides the essential elements to create memorable events. Their inventory also 
features dance floors, staging, luxury washroom rentals, and pipe and drape 
services.

Serving a diverse clientele, including families, corporate event planners, and 
community organizers, Pinnacle Event Rentals caters to various occasions such as 
weddings, corporate functions, fairs, festivals, and graduations. They offer delivery 
and setup services, ensuring a seamless experience for clients. 

Established in 2019, Pinnacle Event Rentals has expanded its offerings through 
strategic acquisitions, including a tent company in January 2020, a luxury portable 
washroom company in May 2020, and a décor company in November 2020. This 
growth reflects their commitment to being a full-service event rental provider. 

With a focus on quality, customer satisfaction, and innovative solutions, Pinnacle 
Event Rentals strives to bring clients' visions to life, ensuring each event is both 
beautiful and functional.
]]></text></topic></topic></map>
